articles.title: Big majority of Americans back sanctions on Russia, aid to Ukraine, poll finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: The latest Washington Post-ABC News poll shows broad bipartisan support for military and humanitarian aid to Ukraine and for sanctions on Russia. But most Americans also want to avoid direct military confrontation with Russia.

articles.title: Australian man faces possible life sentence for pushing gay American to his death from a Sydney cliff - CBS News
articles.description: The man admitted to pushing Scott Johnson off a Sydney clifftop in what prosecutors now call a hate crime, but police initially dismissed as a suicide.
